column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Monday June 3 at 6:30 a.m.

column3: Fayette County High Schools Graduation Ceremonies:
column4: Monday June 3 at Rupp Arena with the following schedule:

column3: Fayette County High Schools Graduation Ceremonies:
column4: Paul Laurence Dunbar HS from 10 a.m. to 12 p.m.

column3: Fayette County High Schools Graduation Ceremonies:
column4: Tates Creek HS from 1:30 p.m. to 3:30 p.m.

column3: Fayette County High Schools Graduation Ceremonies:
column4: Bryan Station HS from 5 p.m. to 7 p.m.

column3: Fayette County High Schools Graduation Ceremonies:
column4: Use added caution if traveling downtown and watch for pedestrians.
